body.p: Bicameral legislative body of the Confederate State of America. Convened in Richmond, Virginia. The First Congress met from February 18, 1862 to February 18, 1864. The Second Congress met from May 2, 1864 to March 18, 1865.

ab.bibl: Ezra J. Warner, Biographical Register of the Confederate Congress (Baton Rouge: Louisiana State University Press, 1975).
